Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaagiya Pavulum, Sagodharanaagiya Theemoththeyum, Korindhu Pattanaththilulla Devanudaiya Sabaikkum, Agaayaa Naadengumulla Ellaap Parisuththavaangalukkum Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum, Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
3 namadhu Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanum, Irakkangalin Pidhaavum, Sagalavidhamaana Aarudhalin Dhevanumaayirukkiravarukku Sthoththiram.

4 dhevanaal Engalukku Arulappadugira Aarudhalinaale, Endha Ubaththiravaththilaagilum Agappadugiravargalukku Naangal Aarudhal Seyyath Thiraaniyullavargalaagumpadi, Engalukku Varum Sagala Ubaththiravangalileyum Avare Engalukku Aarudhalseygiravar.
5 eppadiyenil, Kiristhuvinudaiya Paadugal Engalidaththil Perugugiradhupola, Kiristhuvinaale Engalukku Aarudhalum Perugugiradhu.

6 aadhalaal, Naangal Ubaththiravappattaalum Adhu Ungal Aarudhalukkum Ratchippukkum Edhuvaagum; Naangal Aarudhaladaindhaalum Adhuvum Ungal Aarudhalukkum Ratchippukkum Edhuvaagum; Naangal Paadupadugiradhupola Neengalum Paadupattu Sagikkiradhinaale Andha Ratchippu Balanseygiradhu.
7 neengal Engalodekoodap Paadupadugiradhupola Engalodekooda Aarudhalum Adaigireergalendru Naangal Arindhu, Ungalaikkuriththu Urudhiyaana Nambikkaiyullavargalaayirukkirom.

8 aagaiyaal Sagodharare, Aasiyaavil Engalukku Neritta Ubaththiravaththai Neengal Ariyaadhirukka Engalukku Manadhillai. Ennavenil, Pizhaippom Engira Nambikkai Atruppogaththakkadhaaga, Engal Balaththirku Minjina Adhiga Baaramaana Varuththam Engalukku Undaayitru.
9 naangal Engalmel Nambikkaiyaayiraamal, Mariththorai Ezhuppugira Devanmel Nambikkaiyaayirukkaththakkadhaaga, Maranam Varumendru Naangal Engalukkulle Nichchayiththirundhom.
10 appadippatta Maranaththinindrum Avar Engalaith Thappuviththaar, Ippozhudhum Thappuvikkiraar, Innum Thappuvippaar Endru Avarai Nambiyirukkirom.
11 anegarmoolamaai Engalukku Undaana Thayavukkaaga Anegaraal Engal Nimiththam Sthoththirangal Seluththappadumporuttu, Neengalum Vinnappaththinaal Engalukku Udhaviseyyungal.

12 maamsaththirketra Gnaanaththode Nadavaamal, Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyinaal Naangal Ulagaththileyum, Viseshamaaga Ungalidaththileyum, Kapadamillaamal Dhivviya Unmaiyode Nadandhomendru, Engal Manadhu Engalukku Sollunsaatchiye Engal Pugazhchchiyaayirukkiradhu.
13 enendraal, Neengal Vaasiththum Oththukkondumirukkira Kaariyangalaiyeyandri, Verondraiyum Naangal Ungalukku Ezhudhavillai; Mudivubariyandhamum Appadiye Oththukkolveergalendru Nambiyirukkiren.
14 karththaraagiya Yesuvinudaiya Naalile Neengal Engalukkup Pugazhchchiyaayiruppadhupola, Naangalum Ungalukkup Pugazhchchiyaayirukkiradhai Oruvaaru Oththukkondirukkireergale.
15 naan Ippadippatta Nambikkaiyaik Kondirukkirapadiyinaal, Ungalukku Irandaandharamum Pirayojanamundaagumpadi, Mudhalaavadhu Ungalidaththil Varavum,

16 pinbu Ungal Oorvazhiyaai Makkedhoniyaa Naattukkup Pogavum, Makkedhoniyaavai Vittu Marupadiyum Ungalidaththirku Varavum, Ungalaal Yoodheyaa Dhesaththukku Vazhivittanuppappadavum Yosanaiyaayirundhen.
17 ippadi Naan Yosiththadhu Veenaaga Yosiththeno? Alladhu Aam Aam Engiradhum, Alla Alla Engiradhum, Ennidaththile Irukkaththakkadhaaga, Naan Yosikkiravaigalai Maamsaththinpadi Yosikkireno?
18 naangal Ungalukku Sonnavaarththai Aam Alla Endru Irukkavillai; Adharku Unmaiyulla Devane Saatchi.
19 ennaalum, Silvaanuvinaalum, Theemoththeyuvinaalum, Ungalukkulle Pirasangikkappatta Devakumaaranaagiya Yesukiristhuvum Aam Endrum Alla Endrum Iraamal, Aam Endre Irukkiraar.
20 engalaal Dhevanukku Magimaiyundaagumpadi, Dhevanudaiya Vaakkuththaththangalellaam Yesukiristhuvukkul Aam Endrum, Avarukkul Aamen Endrum Irukkiradhe.
21 ungalodekooda Engalaiyum Kiristhuvukkul Sthirappaduththi, Nammai Abishegampanninavar Devane.
22 avar Nammai Muththiriththu, Nammudaiya Irudhayangalil Aaviyennum Achchaaraththaiyum Koduththirukkiraar.
23 melum Naan Ungalaith Thappavidumpadikke Idhuvaraikkum Korindhupattanaththirku Varaadhirukkirenendru, En Aaththumaavinperil Dhevanaiye Saatchiyaagak Korugiren.
24 ungal Visuvaasaththirku Naangal Adhigaarigalaayiraamal, Ungal Santhoshaththirku Sagaayaraayirukkirom; Visuvaasaththinaale Nilainirkireergale.
